Banking-grade finance for blockchain

atpar builds financial infrastructure on Ethereum that empowers issuers to tokenize and manage all major financial assets from issuance to maturity at a fraction of today’s cost. The ACTUS Protocol smart contract framework represents financial contracts and their logic on Ethereum as modular, “Lego”-like building blocks.

The ACTUS Protocol Portal

We have set up a demo portal for ACTUS Protocol on Ethereum testnet. Give it a spin to see how easy it is to build on ACTUS Protocol. We will automatically give you some test Ether and Tokens to start with. Time to issue a bond!
